SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.description: The client ID for your Spotify application, required to authenticate with the Spotify API.
SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID.title: SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID

SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The client secret for your Spotify application, needed for secure authentication with the API.
SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET.title: SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET

SPOTIFY_REDIRECT_URI.description: The redirect URI you specified when creating the Spotify application, needed for the OAuth authentication process.
SPOTIFY_REDIRECT_URI.title: SPOTIFY_REDIRECT_URI
